channel.title: Error connecting to server, pls help
channel.description: so some1 told me i need to switch my ip to "127.0.0.1" in client.java so i used the code given by some1 else: server="127.0.0.1"; i got an error, i look online to search for "4359" or something and i couldnt find it either any help please

item.title: Error connecting to server, pls help
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Uhm… What? Speak english please. I would help but I cant understand what you typed.

ill try to reword it. i got a source + client and when i try to login it says “error can’t connect to server” so someone told me i have to switch the server ip in client.java, i tried the code “server = 127.0.0.1”; and when i compiled i got an error so i deleted it. so basically my problem is i cant connect to server when i try to login can u fix that please

Read full topic
item.source: Error connecting to server, pls help
